title: Brazil
description: Returned to the top five after a boom in small-scale PV as a result of a successful net-metering scheme.

title: Philippines
description: The fourth most attractive market for clean energy investment thanks to strong renewable energy policies.

title: India
description: The most attractive market for clean energy investment

title: Morocco
description: Ranked fifth within Africa. It has recently implemented bold renewable energy targets and unlocked the medium-voltage grid for net metering.

title: China
description: Home to 60% of global EV sales

title: Oman
description: The only Middle Eastern market featuring among the top 20 Climatescope scores

title: Greece
